<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1211</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Yom Ha'atzmaut1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Yom Ha'atzmaut1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Yom Ha'atzmaut1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Yom Ha'atzmaut1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Yom Ha'atzmaut1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Yom Ha'atzmaut1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Yom Ha'atzmaut1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners examine Biblical and Talmudical texts that imply that the modern settlement of the Land of Israel and the establishment of the State of Israel were part of a divinely ordained plan to begin the redemption of the Jewish people.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">talmud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">settlement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">land of israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">redemption</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger überprüfen die biblische und 
Talmudical Texte, die andeuten, daß die moderne Regelung des Landes 
von Israel und die Einrichtung des Zustandes von Israel ein Teil eines
göttlich ordinierten Planes waren, zum der Abzahlung der jüdischen 
Leute anzufangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants examinent les textes bibliques et 
de Talmudical qui impliquent que le règlement moderne de la terre de 
l'Israel et l'établissement de l'état de l'Israel faisaient partie 
d'un plan divinement ordonné pour commencer le rachat des personnes 
juives.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners examinam os textos biblical e de 
Talmudical que implicam que o estabelecimento moderno da terra de 
Israel e o estabelecimento do estado de Israel eram parte de uma 
planta divinely ordained para começar o redemption dos povos jewish.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti esaminano i testi di Talmudical e 
biblici che implicano che lo stabilimento moderno della terra 
dell'Israele e l'istituzione del Dichiarare dell'Israele abbiano fatti
parte di un programma divinely ordained per cominciare l'estinzione 
della gente ebrea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι εξετάζουν βιβλικό και τα κείμενα 
Talmudical που υπονοούν ότι η σύγχρονη τακτοποίηση του εδάφους
του Ισραήλ και η καθιέρωση του κράτους του Ισραήλ ήταν μέρος 
ενός divinely ορισμένου σχεδίου για να αρχίσουν την εξαγορά 
των εβραϊκών ανθρώπων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes examinan los textos bíblicos y
de Talmudical que implican que el establecimiento moderno de la pista 
de Israel y el establecimiento del estado de Israel eran parte de un 
plan divinamente ordained para comenzar el rescate de la gente judía.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">talmud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regelung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land von Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abzahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">talmud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">règlement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">terre de l'Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rachat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">talmud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estabelecimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">terra de Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">redemption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">talmud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bibbia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stabilimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">terra dell'Israele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">estinzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">talmud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βίβλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τακτοποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έδαφος του Ισραήλ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξαγορά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
